channel.title: I need to now for my friend new game server thing how does rs run 144 worlds
channel.description: i need to now for my friend new game server thing how does rs run 144 worlds in 1 go?? if u using a webclient does it like auto run 24/7? or is it like they have turn on 144 worlds?

item.title: I need to now for my friend new game server thing how does rs run 144 worlds
item.dc:creator: @D_R_U_G D R U G
item.description:
@D_R_U_G wrote:

Runescape dosn’t run on just any CPU to host 100k+ players 24/7 they need to have like ALOT of ram but, like people at the top say they run on multi computers…

you need to host them… like a normal private server, but 10-20 of them, or how ever many you want… by the way, to run that many, you might need a lot of computers.
